page.title: 15Employment and Unemployment
page.content: On the Questionnaires that were filled in 233 people said they were in full-time employment, 117 said they were in part-time employment and 36 people not in employment said they would like to be.There are not very many places of employment in Burton so we asked people just how far they travelled daily to go to work-97 people said they travelled up to 5 miles which would include people who worked in our village and people who travelled to Scunthorpe to work,90 people said they travelled between 6 and 15 miles and 35 people said they had to travel over 15 miles to their place of work.One person said he travelled 2000 miles and although we did not ask we believe he is one of those people who work in the oil fields of the Middle East.
